Title: 665: JavaScript Educator and Twitch Streamer Mat Marquis
Description:
Show Description

Fresh off his Megaman Streamathon, Mat Marquis joins us to talk about becoming a professional Twitch streamer, creating a JavaScript course, his thoughts on the design and content of said course, a brief moment on Linux in 2025, and attempts to make the web weird and fun again.
